presentationTable.name: Fact - Service Request Milestone
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics

presentationColumns.name: # of SRs
presentationColumns.description: The total number of SRs with Milestones
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of SRs

presentationColumns.name: # of Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total SR Milestones including the Milestones in Cancelled status
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Milestones

presentationColumns.name: # of Active Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total SR Active Milestones (does not include the Milestones in Cancelled status)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Active Milestones

presentationColumns.name: # of Completed Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total Milestones that have been completed (Milestone status = Complete)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Completed Milestones

presentationColumns.name: # of Compliant Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total Compliant Milestones (Milestone Status not equal to Cancelled and Compliance Flag not equal to N)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Compliant Milestones

presentationColumns.name: # of Expired Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total Expired Milestones (Milestone Status not equal to Cancelled and Compliance Flag = N)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Expired Milestones

presentationColumns.name: # of Cancelled Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total SR Milestones that are in Cancelled status. (Milestone status = Cancelled)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Cancelled Milestones

presentationColumns.name: # of Completed Compliant Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total Milestones that have been Completed and are Compliant (Milestone status = Complete and Compliance Flag = Y)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Completed Compliant Milestones

presentationColumns.name: # of Completed Expired Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total Milestones that have been completed and Expired (Milestone status = Complete and Compliance Flag = N)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Completed Expired Milestones

presentationColumns.name: # of Overdue Time Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The total non-compliant/Overdue Milestones. (Compliance Flag = N). Canceled Milestones are also included in this metric.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Overdue Time Milestones

presentationColumns.name: % Completed Milestones
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.% Completed Milestones

presentationColumns.name: % Compliant Milestones
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.% Compliant Milestones

presentationColumns.name: % Expired Milestones
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.% Expired Milestones

presentationColumns.name: % Completed Compliant Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The percentage of Completed Compliant milestones. This metric is calculated as follows: 100*(# of Completed Compliant Milestones/# of Completed Milestones)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.% Completed Compliant Milestones

presentationColumns.name: % Completed Expired Milestones
presentationColumns.description: The percentage of Completed Expired Milestones. This metric is calculated as follows: 100*(# of Completed Expired Milestones/# of Completed Milestones)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.% Completed Expired Milestones

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Time (Minutes)
presentationColumns.description: The total time elapsed in minutes since the SR Milestone was due. Applies for non-compliant milestones.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.Overdue Time (Minutes)

presentationColumns.name: Average of Overdue Time (Minutes)
presentationColumns.description: The total time elapsed in minutes since the SR Milestone was due averaged over a number of overdue time Milestones. Applies for non-compliant milestones.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.Average of Overdue Time (Minutes)

presentationColumns.name: # of Raw SRs (Milestone)
presentationColumns.description: The total number of SRs with Milestones including the deleted SRs.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request Milestone.# of Raw SRs (Milestone)
